item.description:
Dawn Cartwright is a Tantric visionary, sacred writer, world traveler, and innovator in bio-energetic Tantra fusion. She discovered the path of Tantra by accident shortly after a period of life-changing mystical experiences in lovemaking. During her 20 years of teaching, she has integrated the Vigyan Bhairav roots of Tantra, Alexander Lowen’s teachings, the wisdom of Osho, and a microcosm-macrocosm approach to the body. Founder of the Chandra Bindu Tantra Institute in Santa Monica, California, Dawn is dedicated to the realization of human potential through the direct experience of reality. Dawn has had the honor of receiving these transmissions from some of the most acclaimed Tantric masters of modern times, Margo Anand, Daniel Odier, Bohdi Avinasha, and Osho. She teaches in the United States, Ireland and The Netherlands. Dawn lives in Santa Monica, California. www.DawnCartwright.com.

 

Tonight's Topic: Tantra: Awakening Through Devotion


Participating in this FREE TELESEMINAR will be life-changing and will impact you by:


  • Exploring the realm of Tantra as it applies to love, relationship and intimacy

  • Experiencing and learning Tantric meditations that open your heart to each other when you choose or need

  • Tapping into your sexual potential, freeing it as you open your body, heart, and soul

  • Learn how breath and movement effect your Kundalini, your sexual energy

     

    JOIN US!

     

    There will be discussion, a guided meditation and time for Q&A!!!

     

    RSVP here and I will send you the phone # to call in on Wednesday night at 8 pm EST
item.how_to_find_us: In the privacy of your own home, join me and Dawn Cartwright
item.name: Tantra: Awakening Through Devotion (with Dawn Cartwright)
